room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Knoxville in Knoxville
review: We enjoyed the island escape with our family! It was nice doing something different! We took our 13 month old daughter with us and had no problem. She explored the room and had a blast with us!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Knoxville in Knoxville
review: We had a lot of fun during Island Escape at Breakout Games - Knoxville! We had 6 people in our group, ranging in age from 19 - 47 and everyone had a blast! We all felt like we contributed to the solution and were able to celebrate together when we successfully escaped the volcano!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Knoxville in Knoxville
review: I had never done one before. It was a blast. The island escape was challenging, exciting and definitely held my attention. I hope we can do it again. Thanks so much

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Knoxville in Knoxville
review: I have been to a couple different breakout rooms around town and this one is the best so far. My group did "The Island" breakout and had a great time. The thing we liked most was that the objective made sense. Other breakout rooms I have participated in seem like random clues that fit random tasks but this one was different. We understood what we were supposed to do and worked together to get the tasks done. Our final time was 48 min 12 seconds, and we had a blast!

room_title: Escape room "Island Escape" by Breakout Games - Knoxville in Knoxville
review: Best Game Ever!What a fun way to bond with your coworkers and friends alike! Everyone's unique skills and talents come into play at some point in the game.Thanks for an amazing day of fun, unique team building skills!Can't wait to bring my family out to give it a whirl!
